SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into inquiry_rcd_sub (INQUIRY_ID, SYMPTOMS_SEQ, SYMPTOMS_PRI, SYMPTOMS_NAME, SYMPTOMS_TYPE, PHY_BELONG, CONDITION_IF, CONDITION_TIME, RECORD_CLOSE, ORGANS_SEQ, TONGUE_SEQ, TONGUE_PIC_ID1, TONGUE_PIC_ID2, TONGUE_PIC_ID3, TONGUE_PIC_ID4, TONGUE_PIC_ID5) values (#{inquiryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symptomsSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symptomsPri,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symptomsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{symptomsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phyBelong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{conditionIf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recordClose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organsSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tongueSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tonguePicId1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tonguePicId2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tonguePicId3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tonguePicId4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tonguePicId5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update inquiry_rcd_sub set INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYMPTOMS_SEQ = #{symptomsSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYMPTOMS_PRI = #{symptomsPri,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYMPTOMS_NAME = #{symptomsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYMPTOMS_TYPE = #{symptomsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHY_BELONG = #{phyBelong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONDITION_IF = #{conditionIf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONDITION_TIME = #{conditionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECORD_CLOSE = #{recordClose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANS_SEQ = #{organsSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TONGUE_SEQ = #{tongueSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TONGUE_PIC_ID1 = #{tonguePicId1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TONGUE_PIC_ID2 = #{tonguePicId2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TONGUE_PIC_ID3 = #{tonguePicId3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TONGUE_PIC_ID4 = #{tonguePicId4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TONGUE_PIC_ID5 = #{tonguePicId5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CONDITION_ID, INQUIRY_ID, SYMPTOMS_SEQ, SYMPTOMS_PRI, SYMPTOMS_NAME, SYMPTOMS_TYPE, PHY_BELONG, CONDITION_IF, CONDITION_TIME, RECORD_CLOSE, ORGANS_SEQ, TONGUE_SEQ, TONGUE_PIC_ID1, TONGUE_PIC_ID2, TONGUE_PIC_ID3, TONGUE_PIC_ID4, TONGUE_PIC_ID5 from inquiry_rcd_sub where CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
